title: Oh raajeevaakshha
sahitya:
O rAjIvAkSa OrajUpula jUcEda vErA nE nIku vErA



anupallavi



 nErani nApai nEramu lEnitE gArAdani paluku vArulEni nannu



caraNam 1



 makkuvatO ninnu mrokkina janulaku dikku nIvani ati grakkuna brOtuvani 

ekkuva sujanula okka mATalu vini cakkani shrI rAma dakkati gAdarA

   

caraNam 2



 miti mErulEni prakrtilOna dagili nE mati hInuDai sannuti sEyanEraka 

batimAli nIvE gatiyani nera nammiti gAni ninu maracitinA santatamu

   

caraNam 3



 mAvara suguNa umAvara sannuta dEvara daya cEsi brOvaga rAdA 

pAvana bhakta janAvana mahAnubhAva tyAgarAja bhAvita inkanu
